CB-8107 CB-8108 Enable SSL enforcement for AWS & Azure DL external DB

* Rebased onto #9215
* Enable SSL enforcement for the external DB of data lakes. The list of
  cloud platforms where this is applied is controlled by the new
  Datalake service property
  datalake.supported.externaldb.sslenforcement.platform (see
  PlatformConfig.dbServiceSslEnforcementSupportedPlatforms).
  * In AWS, the CF stack is extended with a new
    AWS::RDS::DBParameterGroup resource that has rds.force_ssl=1.
    Supported engine versions: 9.5, 9.6, 10.x, 11.x, 12.x, 13.x.
  * In Azure, the Microsoft.DBforPostgreSQL/servers resource will
    have sslEnforcement=Enabled and minimalTlsVersion=TLS1_2.
* Data hub DBs and embedded DBs of any cluster type are not affected.
* Added new unit tests and updated existing ones to use JUnit 5 and
  AssertJ.
